products: Cannabis products including cannabis cigarettes, cannabis preroll, cannabis cigar, cannabis cartridges

company_website.summary: Leaflettes Inc. is a licensed cannabis manufacturing and co-packing company in California that provides high-scale manufacturing and co-packing of cannabis smokable products.
company_website.infomration_about_the_team: The key executives of Leaflettes Inc. appear to be Andrew Cheng, Calvin Tse, Donny Sun, and Lawrence Ji, based on the information available.
